Header: 18 hour water cut for Colombo 13, 14 and 15 from 9 pm tonight
Content: Colombo (News 1st): The National Water Supply and Drainage Board says water supply to Colombo 13, 14 and 15 will be suspended for a period of 18 hours from 9 pm tonight to 3 pm tomorrow (March 3). In addition, Fort and Pettah will have a low pressure water supply during the 18-hour period.
